actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution to provide for the designation of a week as "National Recreation and Parks Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate June 1 through June 7, 1980, as "National Recreation and Park Week."

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to provide for the designation of a week as "National Recreation and Parks Week".
